com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Class CRServoImplEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.CRServoImpl
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.CRServoImplEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CRServo, DcMotorSimple, HardwareDevice, PwmControl

    public class CRServoImplEx
extends CRServoImpl
implements PwmControl
    CRServoEx provides access to extended functionality on continuous rotation servos. Implementations support both the CRServo and PwmControl interfaces.
